name: Lei Dian Huang Bi Ka Qiu Chuan Shuo
summary: Lei Dian Huang Bi Ka Qiu Chuan Shuo (also known as Pokémon Yellow) is a pirated game for the NES made by Shenzhen Nanjing. It's generally regarded as being of higher quality compared to Shenzhen Nanjing's other games. This game is basically a port of Pokémon FireRed / Pokémon LeafGreen Version and Pokémon Yellow Version mixed together with some changes to it.
